mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe(merchant_uid, member_num, name, phone, seller_num, sub_price, sub_date) VALUES(#{merchant_uid}, #{member_num}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{seller_num}, #{sub_price}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM subscribe WHERE member_num=#{member_num} AND seller_num=#{seller_num} AND (sysdate BETWEEN sub_date AND sub_date+30)
SELECT * FROM subscribe WHERE member_num=#{member_num} AND (sysdate BETWEEN sub_date AND sub_date+30) ORDER BY sub_date DESC
